net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io
Class Keymap

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io.Keymap
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultKeymap
public abstract class Keymap
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

A map from physical keyboard keys to the meta-buttons that the game runs on.

registerListener

public final void registerListener(ButtonListener listener)
Registers a new object to listen for meta-button presses.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to register

unregisterListener

public final void unregisterListener(ButtonListener listener)
Unregisters an existing listener from meta-button presses.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to unregister

onPause

public final void onPause()
Called by the game when focus is lost. Fires events that should've happened in the meantime.

onResume

public final void onResume()
Called by the game when focus is regained. Fires events that should've happened in the meantime.

signal

protected final void signal(InputButton button,
                            boolean down)
Signal that a meta-button was pressed to whatever's listening for it.

Parameters:
button - The meta-button that was pushed
down - True if button was pressed down, false if released

signal

protected final void signal(InputButton button)
Signal that a meta-button was pulsed.

Parameters:
button - The meta-button that pulsed

takeSnapshot

protected final java.util.Map<InputButton,java.lang.Boolean> takeSnapshot()
Takes a snapshot of the current button state. Button's state is on or off. This is useful when focus is lost.

Returns:
A mapping from buttons to true if pressed

isButtonDown

public abstract boolean isButtonDown(InputButton button)
Polling input method. Returns true if the input is currently down. In the case of buttons that fire in pulses, it's safe to always return false.

Parameters:
button - The button to check if down
Returns:
True if that button is down, false otherwise

replicateButtonUp

protected abstract void replicateButtonUp(InputButton button)
Fire whatever would've happened to cause this button to come up. It probably happened while focus was lost.

Parameters:
button - The button whose state changed while paused

replicateButtonDown

protected abstract void replicateButtonDown(InputButton button)
Fire whatever would've happened to cause this button to come down. It probably happened while focus was lost.

Parameters:
button - The button whose state changed while paused
